useCases.title: Uses Case for adding a project

useCase.title: Add a DOAP file using the command line

description.p: Add a project description to the registry by adding a DOAP file from the command line.

step.title: Identify DOAP file
step.description: Create or locate the DOAP file.
step.result: You have an URL for the DOAP file.

step.title: Submit DOAP file
step.description: Submit the DOAP file using the command simal addXML DOAP_ FILE. Where DOAP_ FILE is either the URL for the file or the filename.
step.result: If the DOAP file is valid it is added to the repository. If it is not valid a meaningful error message is provided.
step.fixme: Need to provide a script to run the main Simal class.
Need to test quality of error reports.
